text: Jin logon ne apne Rubb ki dawat qabool karli hai unke liye bhalayi hai. Aur jinhon ne isey qabool na kiya woh agar zameen ki saari daulat ke bhi maalik hon aur utni hi aur faraham karlein to woh khuda ki pakad se bachne ke liye is sab ko fidiya (ransom) mein de daalne par tayyar ho jayenge. Yeh woh log hain jinsey buri tarah hisaab liya jayega, aur unka thikana jahannum hai, bahut hi bura thikana
